anyOf.title: This corresponds to MANAGE_APPLICATIONS permission on UI
anyOf.description: This corresponds to MANAGE_APPLICATIONS permission on UI

anyOf.title: Beta: This action will be used to govern workflow rollback
anyOf.description: Beta: This action will be used to govern workflow rollback

AggregatedData.description: This structure will serve pie charts / donut charts

request.description: HTTP request that triggered the changeSet

ApiKeyChangeSet.description: If changeSet got triggered by GraphQL mutation(through API key)

isManualTriggerAuthorized.description:
Beta: When this is set to true, all manual triggers will require API Key authorization.
 Doc link: https://docs.harness.io/article/mc2lxsas4c-trigger-a-deployment-using-c-url#option_enforce_api_keys_for_manual_triggers

artifactId.description: artifact Id input if value type is ARTIFACT_ID

buildNumber.description: Build number input if value type is BUILD_NUMBER

parameterizedArtifactSource.description: Parameterized artifact source input if value type is PARAMETERIZED_ARTIFACT_SOURCE

valueType.description: type of the artifactValue: Build number, artifactId or parameterized artifact source

artifactFilter.description: Build/Tag Filter: Artifacts matching this Filter only will execte the Trigger, Can be Exact match or Regex

artifactSourceId.description: Artifact Source Id: A new Artifact in this ArtifactSource matching the Artifact Filter will execute the Trigger.

regex.description: Regex, True if the Artifact Filter String is provided as regex.

artifactFilter.description: Artifact Build/Tag to filter artifacts when using LAST_COLLECTED

artifactSourceId.description: Artifact source Id to select artifact from. Required for LAST_COLLECTED,FROM_PAYLOAD_SOURCE

pipelineId.description: Pipeline Id to select artifact from, Required when using LAST_DEPLOYED_PIPELINE

regex.description: If Artifact Build/Tag Filter is regex match or not

serviceId.description: Id of the service providing artifact selection for

workflowId.description: Workflow Id to select artifact from, Required when using LAST_DEPLOYED_WORKFLOW

ArtifactoryFileProps.description: Properties for all non-docker artifact types

entityId.description: Unique ID of the harness entity

entityType.description: Type of entity the tag is to be attached to

imageDefinition.description: Requires resource group, image gallery & image definition names

artifactSourceName.description: name of the artifact source to which the specified build number comes from

newYaml.description: New YAML content after the changeSet got triggered

newYamlPath.description: New YAML path after the changeSet got triggered

oldYaml.description: Old YAML content before the changeSet got triggered

oldYamlPath.description: Old YAML path before the changeSet got triggered

resourceId.description: Unique ID of a resource, e.g.Application, Environment
Unique ID of dependent or child resource, e.g.Environment, Services, etc.

failure.description: Indicator of successful processing of the event that caused this changeSet

parentResourceId.description: Unique ID of parent resource, e.g., Application

parentResourceOperation.description: Create / Update / Delete operation on parent resource

resourceId.description: Unique ID of dependent or child resource, e.g., Environment, Services, etc.

ChangeDetails.description:
Trigger of changeSet may have several changes in child or dependent resources,
each of them is captured as changeDetails instance.

isManualTriggerAuthorized.description:
Beta: When this is set to true, all manual triggers will require API Key authorization.
 Doc link: https://docs.harness.io/article/mc2lxsas4c-trigger-a-deployment-using-c-url#option_enforce_api_keys_for_manual_triggers

action.description: Action performed on trigger execute: Workflow/Pipeline execution

applicationId.description: Application Id In which Trigger will be created

condition.description: Condition of which Trigger will execute

triggerId.description: Id of Trigger to be deleted

entityId.description: Unique ID of the harness entity

entityType.description: Type of entity the tag is to be detached from

serviceInputs.description: List of Services that need artifact input

request.description: HTTP request that triggered the changeSet

GenericChangeSet.description:
If changeSet got triggered by any other source than GraphQL mutation(through API key)
or Git action or User action

author.description: Git author who triggered the changeSet

gitCommitId.description: Git commit ID that triggered the changeSet

repoUrl.description: Git repository URL that triggered the changeSet

request.description: HTTP request that triggered the changeSet

GitChangeSet.description: If changeSet got triggered by Git action

action.description: Github Action for the event type.

event.description: Github event type like PUSH, PULL_REQUEST, etc

Number.title: Number
Number.description: This represents either an int or a long or a double. Will be tried to map to one of these in the same order

webhookSecret.description: Beta: Webhook secret to authorize Github webhooks

artifactSourceName.description: name of the artifact source to which the specified build number comes from

continueWithDefaultValues.description: Beta: Coninue with default values as defined in pipeline

pipelineId.description: PipelineId: The trigger will be executed on success of this pipeline.

pipelineStageName.description: Name of the stage to be resumed. i.e "Stage 1"

cronExpression.description: Cron Expression: The time format must be a cron quartz expression.

artifactType.description: Artifact type deployed by this Service

deploymentType.description: Deployment Type: SSH, Helm, or Kubernetes

name.description: name of the service providing input for

SortOrder.description: This data structure will be useful for bar charts which are aggregated over a period of time

applicationId.description: Application identifier of a Workflow or Pipeline

continueWithDefaultValues.description: Beta: Continue with default values in case of pipelines with runtime variables

entityId.description: Entity identifier of a Workflow or Pipeline

excludeHostsWithSameArtifact.description: Skip deployment on the host, if the same artifact is already deployed

serviceInputs.description: Service inputs required for the execution

specificHosts.description: List of hostnames, if targeted to a specific host

targetToSpecificHosts.description: Set to true if the deployment target is specific hosts. Provide specificHosts field along with this.

variableInputs.description: Variable inputs required for the executio

warningMessage.description: Get This field to know if there are any Warnings/Messages but the execution can be started successfully. For Example in case of user providing extra inputs.

relative.description: Filter for a relative time period

specific.description: Filter within a specific time range

TimeSeriesData.description: This data structure will serve timeseries graphs

action.description: Action performed by the trigger: Execute workflow/pipeline

condition.description: The condition that will execute the Trigger: On new artifact, On pipeline completion, On Cron schedule, On webhook

artifactSelections.description: Artifact Selections required for the execution

continueWithDefaultValues.description: Beta: Coninue with default values as defined in pipeline

entityId.description: Entity identifier of the Workflow or Pipeline

excludeHostsWithSameArtifact.description: Skip deployment on the host, if the same artifact is already deployed

variables.description: Variable inputs required for the execution

artifactConditionInput.description: Should be provided when conditionType is ON_NEW_ARTIFACT.

conditionType.description: Condition to execute Trigger: ON_NEW_ARTIFACT, ON_PIPELINE_COMPLETION, ON_SCHEDULE, ON_WEBHOOK

pipelineConditionInput.description: Should be provided when conditionType is ON_PIPELINE_COMPLETION.

scheduleConditionInput.description: Should be provided when conditionType is ON_SCHEDULE.

webhookConditionInput.description: Should be provided when conditionType is ON_WEBHOOK.

repositoryName.description: Specify the repository name. If your Harness Source Repo Provider uses the Git Account type, provide the Repo Name to use from that account.

isManualTriggerAuthorized.description:
Beta: When this is set to true, all manual triggers will require API Key authorization.
 Doc link: https://docs.harness.io/article/mc2lxsas4c-trigger-a-deployment-using-c-url#option_enforce_api_keys_for_manual_triggers

action.description: Action performed on trigger execute: Workflow/Pipeline execution

condition.description: Condition of which Trigger will execute

triggerId.description: Id of Trigger to be updated

request.description: HTTP request that triggered the changeSet

UserChangeSet.description: If changeSet got triggered by User action

allowMultipleValues.description: True if a variable allows multiple values. You need to provide , separated list of values.

allowedValues.description: allowed values. Only for text variables.

defaultValue.description: Default value, Only for text variables

fixed.description: If a variable id fixed variable.

required.description: If the variable is a required variable

type.description: type of the value: name or if

bitbucketEvent.description: Bitbucket  event, Required if webhookSourceType = BITBUCKET

branchName.description: Branch in which the filePaths exist.

branchRegex.description: Branch filter, can be used if using PullRequest or Push events.

deployOnlyIfFilesChanged.description: Only for Native Helm and Helm-based Kubernetes deployments. Event type should be PUSH.

filePaths.description: The file names/paths when changed and Pushed, will execute this Trigger.

gitConnectorId.description: Source Repo Provider setup in Harness

githubEvent.description: Github event, Required if webhookSourceType = GITHUB

gitlabEvent.description: Gitlab  event, Required if webhookSourceType = GITLAB

repoName.description: Git repository name in case when Account level Git connector is provided

webhookSecret.description: Beta: Webhook secret to authorize Github webhooks

webhookSourceType.description: Source of the webhook: GITHUB/GITLAB/BITBUCKET/CUSTOM(curl based)

applicationId.description: Application identifier of a Workflow or Pipeline. Use applicationByName API to fetch this information

entityId.description: Workflow or Pipeline identifier. Use WorkflowByName API to fetch this information

variableInputs.description: Variable inputs if the Workflow or Pipeline is templatized. Provide the required variable values to know about the required inputs

includeIndirectExecutions.description: Set this flag to true to include workflow executions along pipeline
